traits.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The oozing vulture has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The oozing vulture has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
